lemma transitive: fixes P :: pi and Q :: pi and R :: pi and Rel :: "(pi \<times> pi) set" and Rel' :: "(pi \<times> pi) set" and Rel'' :: "(pi \<times> pi) set" assumes PSimQ: "P \<leadsto><Rel> Q" and QSimR: "Q \<leadsto><Rel'> R" and Eqvt: "eqvt Rel" and Eqvt': "eqvt Rel''" and Trans: "Rel O Rel' \<subseteq> Rel''" and Sim: "\<And>P Q. (P, Q) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q" and PRelQ: "(P, Q) \<in> Rel" shows "P \<leadsto><Rel''> R"
